title: ServiceRequest data model based on HL7 equivalent resource

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' This is a ServiceRequest resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Meta' The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Narrative' A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/ResourceList' These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Identifier' Identifiers assigned to this order instance by the orderer and/or the receiver and/or order fulfiller.

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

instantiatesCanonical.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/canonical' The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this ServiceRequest.

items.description: A URI that is a reference to a canonical URL on a FHIR resource

instantiatesUri.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/uri' The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this ServiceRequest.

items.description: String of characters used to identify a name or a resource
Base definition for all elements in a resource.

basedOn.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' Plan/proposal/order fulfilled by this request.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

replaces.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' The request takes the place of the referenced completed or terminated request(s).

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

requisition.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Identifier' An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

status.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_status.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

intent.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_intent.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

category.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A code that classifies the service for searching, sorting and display purposes (e.g. "Surgical Procedure").

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

priority.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_priority.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_doNotPerform.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

code.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

orderDetail.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' Additional details and instructions about the how the services are to be delivered.   For example, and order for a urinary catheter may have an order detail for an external or indwelling catheter, or an order for a bandage may require additional instructions specifying how the bandage should be applied.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

quantityQuantity.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Quantity' A measured amount (or an amount that can potentially be measured). Note that measured amounts include amounts that are not precisely quantified, including amounts involving arbitrary units and floating currencies.

quantityRatio.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Ratio' A relationship of two Quantity values - expressed as a numerator and a denominator.

quantityRange.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Range' A set of ordered Quantities defined by a low and high limit.

subject.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

encounter.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

occurrenceDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' The date/time at which the requested service should occur.

_occurrenceDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

occurrencePeriod.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Period' A time period defined by a start and end date and optionally time.

occurrenceTiming.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Timing' Specifies an event that may occur multiple times. Timing schedules are used to record when things are planned, expected or requested to occur. The most common usage is in dosage instructions for medications. They are also used when planning care of various kinds, and may be used for reporting the schedule to which past regular activities were carried out.

asNeededBoolean.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/' If a CodeableConcept is present, it indicates the pre-condition for performing the service.  For example "pain", "on flare-up", etc.

_asNeededBoolean.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

asNeededCodeableConcept.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

authoredOn.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/dateTime' A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month).  If hours and minutes are specified, a time zone SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored.                 Dates SHALL be valid dates.

_authoredOn.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

requester.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

performerType.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

performer.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' The desired performer for doing the requested service.  For example, the surgeon, dermatopathologist, endoscopist, etc.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

locationCode.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' The preferred location(s) where the procedure should actually happen in coded or free text form. E.g. at home or nursing day care center.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

locationReference.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference to the the preferred location(s) where the procedure should actually happen. E.g. at home or nursing day care center.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

reasonCode.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' An explanation or justification for why this service is being requested in coded or textual form.   This is often for billing purposes.  May relate to the resources referred to in `supportingInfo`.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

reasonReference.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' Indicates another resource that provides a justification for why this service is being requested.   May relate to the resources referred to in `supportingInfo`.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

insurance.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' Insurance plans, coverage extensions, pre-authorizations and/or pre-determinations that may be needed for delivering the requested service.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

supportingInfo.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' Additional clinical information about the patient or specimen that may influence the services or their interpretations.     This information includes diagnosis, clinical findings and other observations.  In laboratory ordering these are typically referred to as "ask at order entry questions (AOEs)".  This includes observations explicitly requested by the producer (filler) to provide context or supporting information needed to complete the order. For example,  reporting the amount of inspired oxygen for blood gas measurements.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

specimen.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' One or more specimens that the laboratory procedure will use.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

bodySite.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' Anatomic location where the procedure should be performed. This is the target site.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

note.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Annotation' Any other notes and comments made about the service request. For example, internal billing notes.

items.description: A  text note which also  contains information about who made the statement and when.

patientInstruction.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

_patientInstruction.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

relevantHistory.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMART%20HEALTH/HL7/Reference' Key events in the history of the request.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'ServiceRequest'
